result.execSummary:
The defendant Kathleen L. PLOOR was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Business Setting >$5000-$10,000, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Manitowoc County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Pay restitution of $8,965.99 to Candlelighters of the Lakeshore Counties c/o Sandy Smith at 4004 Wildwood Drive, Manitowoc, WI 54220.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain full-time employment or work search as the defendant is able unless social security prohibits it.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

No handling of funds in th course of employment, charitable groups or volunteer groups.

Submit a DNA sample and pay surcharge.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

timeConds.notes: Under the Huber Law.  Four (4) months served up front; Four (4) months stayed to be imposed at agent's discretion.
Complete 100 hours of community service in a cancer treatment center.

records.addlTxt:
Theft - Business Setting - No contest plea.   Convicted.   Defendant must submit DNA sample.   Sentencing hearing is set for 10-06-16 at 8:30 a.m.   
Minutes.
Plea date on September 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

There is an issue with up front payment of restitution.   Scheduling conference set for 07-18-16 at 4:30 p.m.   
Minutes.
Plea date on June 15, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Plea date at 04-07-2016 02:00 pm
Status conference at 02-09-2016 02:45 pm
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Preliminary held.  Probable cause found.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed. Defendant waives the reading of the Information.
Not guilty plea entered to the charge contained in the Information.  Jury Calendar.
Settlement conference with the District Attorney set for 09-10-15 at 10:00 a.m.
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 08-05-15 at 1:30 p.m.
Bail is set at $2,500.00 recognizance bond with the condition that she have no contact with the organization called The Candlelighters.  
Bail furnished.
Minutes.
Cover letter.

RE:  Candlelighters, between 08-01-13 and 12-31-14.
Initial appearance is set for 07-20-15 at 2:30 p.m.
